column33:
FAS=[[Fastred of Greenholm]]
Fastred and Elanor removed to the [[Westmarch]], a country then newly settled (being a gift of [[Aragorn
column34: King Elessar]]) between the [[Far Downs]] and the [[Tower Hills]].  From them came the ''Fairbairns of the Towers'', [[Warden of Westmarch
column35: Wardens of Westmarch]], who inherited the [[Red Book of Westmarch
column36: Red Book]], and made several copies with various notes and later additions.</ref>
